Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a grand slam in the sixth inning
Others: The Mets reached the National League Championship Series
The Phillies are looking for the franchise’s third championship
The Mets finished off the rival Phillies in Game 4 of their best-of-five Division Series
The Mets won 3-1 to wrap up a postseason series at home for the first time in 24 years
The Mets will open the best-of-seven NLCS on Sunday at the San Diego Padres or Los Angeles Dodgers

Key Match Events: Giancarlo Stanton hit a go-ahead homer in the eighth inning
Others: The Yankees won despite another frustrating night in the postseason for MVP front-runner Aaron Judge
The Yankees will turn to six-time All-Star pitcher Gerrit Cole on Thursday night with a chance to reach the American League Championship Series

Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers, baseball’s hottest team the past two months, will have their first chance to advance in the playoffs since 2013 on Thursday night in Game 4 at Comerica Park
Others: Cleveland has gone 20 straight innings without scoring since opening the series with a five-run first and a two-run sixth in their 7-0 win
Detroit reliever Will Vest entered with two on and two outs in the seventh and got David Fry to line out to Matt Vierling at third

Key Match Events: Mookie Betts homered for the second straight night
Shohei Ohtani hit an RBI single
Miscellaneous Highlights: The winner will have home-field advantage in the National League Championship Series against the New York Mets
The Dodgers got a superb effort by opener Ryan Brasier and seven fellow relievers in a bullpen game, holding the Padres to seven hits and extending their scoreless streak to 15 innings
Others: Evans Phillips, who got the win, retired Jurickson Profar, Manny Machado and Jackson Merrill on five pitches in the sixth
The Padres won 10-2 at Dodger Stadium in Game 2 on Sunday night, when tempers flared on the field and in the stands
